issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

fields.summary: ELB stack trace logged on ufs host : group cannot be deleted because it is in use

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Delete of an autoscaling group can fail with the error ScalingActivityInProgress. When this occurs elb retries the delete but also logs an error / stack trace:

{code}
Wed Dec 21 09:05:29 2016 DEBUG [Exceptions:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-720] Failed to send message DeleteAutoScalingGroupType to service autoscaling-request because: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingClientException: Scaling activity in progress
Wed Dec 21 09:05:29 2016 ERROR [EucalyptusActivityTasks$EucalyptusActivityTask:listenable-future-pool-929] Loadbalancer activity error
com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message DeleteAutoScalingGroupType to service autoscaling-request because: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingClientException: Scaling activity in progress
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$send$1(ServiceContext.java:259)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$runWithContext$2(ServiceContext.java:292)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandlingException: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingClientException: Scaling activity in progress
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.processMessage(MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.java:96)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.ServiceActivatingHandler.handleRequestMessage(ServiceActivatingHandler.java:89)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.handleMessageInternal(AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.java:109)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MessageHandlerChain$1.send(MessageHandlerChain.java:129)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.send(AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.java:105)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.sendOutput(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:292)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.produceOutput(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:212)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.sendOutputs(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:129)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.handleMessageInternal(AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.java:115)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MessageHandlerChain.handleMessageInternal(MessageHandlerChain.java:110)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.AbstractDispatcher.tryOptimizedDispatch(AbstractDispatcher.java:116)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.doDispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:148)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.dispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:121)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractSubscribableChannel.doSend(AbstractSubscribableChannel.java:77)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:423)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:373)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSendAndReceive(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:150)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSendAndReceive(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessagingTemplate.sendAndReceive(AbstractMessagingTemplate.java:42)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractDestinationResolvingMessagingTemplate.sendAndReceive(AbstractDestinationResolvingMessagingTemplate.java:112)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$send$1(ServiceContext.java:254)
	... 4 more
Caused by: com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingClientException: Scaling activity in progress
	at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingService.handleRemoteException(AutoScalingService.java:112)
	at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.service.AutoScalingService.dispatchAction(AutoScalingService.java:78)
	at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor947.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.support.ReflectiveMethodExecutor.execute(ReflectiveMethodExecutor.java:113)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference.getValueInternal(MethodReference.java:129)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference.access$000(MethodReference.java:49)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference$MethodValueRef.getValue(MethodReference.java:347)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.CompoundExpression.getValueInternal(CompoundExpression.java:88)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.SpelNodeImpl.getTypedValue(SpelNodeImpl.java:131)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpression.getValue(SpelExpression.java:330)
	at org.springframework.integration.util.AbstractExpressionEvaluator.evaluateExpression(AbstractExpressionEvaluator.java:169)
	at org.springframework.integration.util.MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.processInternal(MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.java:317)
	at org.springframework.integration.util.MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.process(MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.java:155)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.processMessage(MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.java:93)
	... 30 more
Wed Dec 21 09:05:29 2016  WARN [LoadBalancingActivitiesImpl:SWF Activity  LoadBalancerTasks 13] Failed to delete autoscale group (1'th attempt): euca-internal-elb-000318138513-4a617ca2-28c4--balancer1-one
{code}

we should not log an error or stack trace when this occurs (if all retries fail then that may be an error)
fields.summary: ELB stack trace logged when delete of autoscaling group is retried

comments.body: I just deleted the line logging when the retry fails. Eventually when all retry fails, there will be error logs (no change in that part). So there is no QA necessary for this ticket.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25812.163.20170303gitb711a30.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus VPC, multi-cluster cloud - [hspencer-529-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/529/]
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	port-of-miami	available
{code}
# Created non-eucalyptus account (for example {{engineering}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Bundled, uploaded and registered Ubuntu Xenial HVM EMI:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-images --region eng-admin@
IMAGE	emi-e34fb3d1	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170307/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000225068559	available	private	x86_64	machine		instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Used linked {{cfn-elb-asg-deployment-vpc-template.json}} template to create an ELB+ASG stack:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-create-stack EUCA13058Stack --template-file cfn-elb-asg-deployment-vpc-template.json -p ImageId=emi-e34fb3d1 -p KeyName=eng-admin -p EndPoint=http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ -p VPC=vpc-3da45502 -p SubnetOne=subnet-9930b3c3 -p SubnetTwo=subnet-9c9ca5a0 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --tag Purpose="Stack to test EUCA-13058" --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/EUCA13058Stack/8507fe16-2590-42f6-938a-363bb25ae16c
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	EUCA13058Stack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to multi-az ELB,  deployment on Eucalyptus VPC cloud	2017-03-07T18:39:19.904Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-e34fb3d1
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
PARAMETER	VPC		vpc-3da45502
PARAMETER	SubnetOne		subnet-9930b3c3
PARAMETER	SubnetTwo		subnet-9c9ca5a0
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://EUCA13058Stack-ELB-VFPCSKKCLNJNM-000225068559.lb.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Delete the ASG:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region eng-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA	black-market,black-dollar	EUCA13058Stack-ELB-VFPCSKKCLNJNM	2	4	2	Default
INSTANCE	i-bd22a119	black-market	InService	Healthy	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA
INSTANCE	i-6eda2714	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Name	EUCA13058Stack	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Purpose	Stack to test EUCA-13058	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/EUCA13058Stack/8507fe16-2590-42f6-938a-363bb25ae16c	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	EUCA13058Stack	true
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593 --desired-capacity 0 -m 0 -M 0 --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region eng-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA	black-market,black-dollar	EUCA13058Stack-ELB-VFPCSKKCLNJNM	0	0	0	Default
INSTANCE	i-bd22a119	black-market	InService	Healthy	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA
INSTANCE	i-6eda2714	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Name	EUCA13058Stack	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Purpose	Stack to test EUCA-13058	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/EUCA13058Stack/8507fe16-2590-42f6-938a-363bb25ae16c	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	EUCA13058Stack	true
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region eng-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	EUCA13058Stack-LaunchConfig-8YNNKOW5XWQFA	black-market,black-dollar	EUCA13058Stack-ELB-VFPCSKKCLNJNM	0	0	0	Default
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Name	EUCA13058Stack	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	Purpose	Stack to test EUCA-13058	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/EUCA13058Stack/8507fe16-2590-42f6-938a-363bb25ae16c	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	EUCA13058Stack	true
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-delete-auto-scaling-group EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593 --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]#
{code}
# Confirm errors didn't show up in the cloud logs on the CLC and UFS(s):
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log:Tue Mar 7 11:22:04 2017 96d8b30a-9efe-42b1-9b05-6a00b3d2530a::02b7c05e-9f00-4948-bb2d-6ab2adb6eed5 arn:aws:euare::000225068559:user/admin /10.111.5.160:40922 /10.111.5.216:8773 autoscalingbackend DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,--REDACTED--]
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.144 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.160 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log:Tue Mar 7 11:22:04 2017 96d8b30a-9efe-42b1-9b05-6a00b3d2530a arn:aws:euare::000225068559:user/admin /10.111.5.216:44116 /10.111.5.160:8773 autoscaling DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,AutoScalingGroupName=EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593]
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.158 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]#
{code}
# Delete the stack:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-delete-stack EUCA13058Stack --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]#
{code}
# Confirm errors didn't show up in the cloud logs on the CLC and UFS(s):
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Mar 7 11:24:37 2017 d188ea7e-5798-4951-9270-d75ab6dab3c5::063daf13-579a-45c2-8904-a437cf8ebe40 arn:aws:euare::000142298990:user/admin /10.111.5.144:34200 /10.111.5.216:8773 autoscalingbackend DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,--REDACTED--]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Mar 7 11:24:37 2017 3f96d086-4f36-4bb4-b0a8-65d09f71c9e5::c5a11527-4f38-4036-bdec-980d6f5c3ec7 arn:aws:euare::000142298990:user/admin /10.111.5.144:34296 /10.111.5.216:8773 autoscalingbackend DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,--REDACTED--]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.2:Tue Mar 7 11:22:04 2017 96d8b30a-9efe-42b1-9b05-6a00b3d2530a::02b7c05e-9f00-4948-bb2d-6ab2adb6eed5 arn:aws:euare::000225068559:user/admin /10.111.5.160:40922 /10.111.5.216:8773 autoscalingbackend DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,--REDACTED--]
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.144 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.160 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log:Tue Mar 7 11:22:04 2017 96d8b30a-9efe-42b1-9b05-6a00b3d2530a arn:aws:euare::000225068559:user/admin /10.111.5.216:44116 /10.111.5.160:8773 autoscaling DeleteAutoScalingGroupType [POST,AutoScalingGroupName=EUCA13058Stack-AutoScalingGroup-IRAYGK1VKU593]
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.158 "grep  DeleteAutoScalingGroupType /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]#
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
